channel.title: Mapping out rs in hd
channel.description:
hey everyone, i have been thinking about this for awhile, and i have decided to ask for help about it. what my idea is, is that we set up a modifyed client to create a camera and take birds eye pics of the runescape landscape, with roofs and all. if you dont understand what i mean, this pic should explain it.
(these were taken from runescape.com)
and last example:
so basically what i want to do is get hundreds upo hundreds of hi res pictures and import them into a google maps like client, for runescape and rsps users to freely use.
thanks and please reply
-EDIT-
Someone did this with morrowind, and is a great example of what i want to do here.
Link: [url=http://www.uesp.net/maps/mwmap/mwmap.shtml]http://www.uesp.net/maps/mwmap/mwmap.shtml[/url]
(if this is in the wrong section, please tell me, but the reason i posted it here was it is a client mod.)

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

an offtopic question… why do they even have a morrowind map? doesn’t the elder scrolls just let you fast travel to locations?
EDIT: nevermind, i just realised i was thinking of oblivion not morrowind.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

mhmm, sounds like the kind of thing im looking for, does anyone hapen to have a link?

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

There is a tutorial somewhere on how to dump map regions as images which could make this considerably easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Wolf, you have a nice way of explaining the idea of it, but the problem is zooming out the camera enough. I suggest something along the lines of using the minimap to grab the pictures, like RS did for their world-map.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

yeah, but in a image format, like this if you havent allready looked at it.
http://www.uesp.net/maps/mwmap/mwmap.shtml
that was done with a little engine modding.
(its morrowind from the eldarscrolls 3)

i think wolfs goal knows what i mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

wolfs goal:

You mean by using the frames from the server, then making the camera yaw show around runescape as a 3-D virtual tour?

This idea would work better.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Oh, now I see what you mean…I don’t think it is impossible, but at the same time, I don’t think it’s within reach yet. You would have to set up a bot that would take a screenshot of different map regions.

Probably use something like:

screenshotid++;
mapX++;
mapY++;

Those are the only three things I could see as working in a generated code. This way it would read something like (MapX, MapY, Area);

I’m not sure about this…

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Googlescape maps?
I like the idea

Read full topic

item.title: Mapping out rs in hd
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

no, like make the clients camera like 30% higher in the sky and face down, then move over the landscape taking photos, and save them in a file in numerical order, then get a web based program like google earth and inport the photos into that, so players can get a good view of where they are traveling to, or where monsters are.

Read full topic
